projectGridLines.title: Applied AI/ML in Commerical Real Estate
projectGridLines.description:
The intern will analyze and prepare data for forecasting, develop and document preliminary machine learning models, and support efforts in testing, deployment, and model comparison. This role involves hands-on data exploration, model development, and contributing to the setup of new data processes.Skill sets (Minor certificates)Minor in Data Science; Minor in Finance Facilities provided to students

a) Travel to host organization

b) Accommodation

c) Subsidized lunchAccess to library, gym, indoor games (TT, snooker, chess)

Subsidized lunch
